original: 北伐樊城，于禁七軍援救曹仁；八月連綿大雨、漢水驟漲，關羽乘機敗之「水淹七軍」，獲降兵三萬，鄰近盜賊皆投靠。
text: The northern expedition to Fancheng, the Seventh Army rescued Cao Ren; in August, with continuous heavy rains and the rapid rise of the Han River, Guan Yu took advantage of the opportunity to defeat the "Flooded Seventh Army" and received 30,000 troops. All nearby thieves took refuge.
